nodes.text: Varek Tarn was a male Mandalorian warlord during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He stole the construction plans for the Sovereign Forge, a planned Imperial mining station and shipyard, and attempted to sell them to the Republic at a minefield in the Cha Raaba system. However, the Empire caught up to Tarn and destroyed the shuttle carrying the plans.
